## OpenAPI.Point.relativeToParent() method

相对于父级容器的坐标

**Signature:**

```typescript
static relativeToParent(objectsArray: {
            x: number;
            y: number;
        }[], parent: {
            x: number;
            y: number;
        }): {
            x: number;
            y: number;
        }[];
```

## Example


```ts
const objectsArray = [{ x: 1, y: 2 }, { x: 3, y: 4 }]
const parent = { x: 5, y: 6 }
const result = OpenAPI.Point.relativeToParent(objectsArray, parent) // 返回相对于父级容器的坐标
```
